conbody.p: roll callThe teacher may want to student attendance call at the beginning of a class. Select ClassRoll call from the main menu to initiate student roll call registration.
conbody.note: Performing the roll call registration resets assignment of students to groups as all registered students are automatically assigned to group A. It is therefore advantageous to perform registration at the beginning of the class.
Student attendance is recorded in the class logbook which is accessible in IdlLAB advanced mode (see ).
conbody.p: Students must press Call button on their modules to perform the registration.
Select ClassRoll call again to finish the roll call registration.
conbody.note: Use the student menu (see ) to manually change registration status of individual students.
